title: Band-Aid Brand Adhesive Bandage Family Variety Pack, Sheer and Clear Bandages, Assorted Sizes, 280 ct
description: Covered wounds heal faster than if left uncovered by protecting against dirt & germs that may cause infection. Try Band-Aid Brand Sterile Adhesive Bandages from the #1 doctor recommended bandage brand. The Adhesive Bandage Family Variety Pack contains five different shapes & assorted sizes of sheer & clear adhesive bandages for any minor cuts, scrapes, or burns. These sterile first aid bandages feature a Quilt-Aid Comfort Pad designed to cushion painful wounds while you heal & Tri-Ply backing with unique adhesive for real staying power, so bandages stay put so you don't have to. This package contains: Sheer Strips bandages measuring 1.75 by 4 inches; Sheer Strips bandages measuring 1 by 3 inches; Clear Strips bandages measuring.75 by 3 inches; Sheer Strips bandages measuring.625 by 2.25 inches; & Clear Spots bandages measuring.875 by.875 inches. The Family Variety Pack of assorted bandages makes a great addition to first aid kits & at-home wound care supplies.
